item.title: Breakout
item.description: Demo Video A third-person adventure game made for Android. The goal is to rescue the hostages and lead them to the exit. This game was made in 2019 as a school project between Toby Tinker and myself. My role was programming and level design. Toby’s role was modelling and textures. This game was made using Unity3D, C#, and Magicavoxel. Download for Android
